name: Qantas A380 Business Class Review - QF12 LAX-SYD
description:
Experience business class with Qantas on the Airbus A380 from LAX to Sydney on QF12.  This Qantas business class review will show you what it's really like to fly business class.  This includes the Qantas business class seat that turns into a lie flat bed.  

This review is of Qantas Flight QF12 from Los Angeles to Sydney on Sunday 19 July 2015.  

Qantas Business Class is located on the upper deck of the Airbus A380 in a 2-2-2 configuration.  Qantas operates 4 classes on these aircraft:  First Class, Business Class, Premium Economy and Economy.  

QF12 departs late evening out of LA and arrives into Sydney early morning.  Meals served on board include a supper service after take off and a breakfast service before landing.
